1.title: We've Got a Lot of Catching Up to Do

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: New consultant Becca helps Bride Lindsey find a dress despite a ticking clock and an opinionated entourage. Bride Kisha's path to the altar has been full of drama..but is her happy ending within reach or will a surprise postpone her walk down the aisle?

2.title: Let Me Show Y'all How It's Done

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Monte's BFF is shopping for her wedding dress. But he's not the only man who thinks he knows what's best for the bride! Bride Marcia's uncles are strictly "Team Sparkle." But Mom's preference for "simple" might be an obstacle!

3.title: Paying it Forward

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Bride Alyssa's future is bright following her life-threatening battle with kidney disease. And a day of surprises is just the start of her brand new journey. Bride Shornell's last minute dress-dilemma has the consultants scrambling for a solution.

4.title: I Feel Like I'm in Dress Heaven

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Bride Sherien is over the moon she finally gets to go wedding dress shopping! With her fianc� in federal prison for a couple more years, she has time to browse. Bride Carla is eloping in Santorini, Greece and needs a gown for her intimate, magical day!

5.title: You Can't Give Everyone a Rose

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Former Bachelorette Britt finally found love and needs a dress fast. Good thing designer Matthew Christopher's in the house to help! Six-foot-two Bride Shelby never had a dress she liked. Can the team prove that bridal bliss comes in all shapes and sizes?

6.title: Walking on Egg Shells

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The BBL staff has seen it all, but even they're caught off guard by Bride Kandace's complicated family dynamics! Bride Kelly's pageant coach is ruffling everyone's feathers, and if he doesn't shut up he might get shut out of this very special day.

7.title: Men of Honor

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Somebody Just Turned on the Vixen

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Bride Erin is looking for a "sexy vixen" reception dress. Will the fox loose in the henhouse be the one to find it? Bride Sami and Mom are best friends and psychics. But can Robin read their minds to find the dress to satisfy their very different tastes?

9.title: Way Ou tof My Comfort Zone

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When Consultant Melissa fills in for no-show Mollie at the last minute, she's thrilled to find out her bride is Miss America! Meanwhile, wounded warrior, Joan, slips into a form fitting dress, which may be a bigger risk than she is willing to take.

10.title: It's Dani's Day!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Country star, Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum, helps leukemia survivor Bride Dani pick the perfect dress. As a little person, Arica has spent her life being disappointed in clothes. Can Flo guide her to a wedding gown that fits and flatters?

1.title: Virgin Brides Wear Sleeves

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: When a bride's taste clashes with her Grandmother's, something has to give, especially when they hold the purse strings. Haley's grandma thinks a virgin bride should wear sleeves. Leah's grandmother wants those knees covered. Melissa has buyer's remorse.

2.title: Breaking the Curse

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Some brides bring more to their appointments then budgets and family members. Superstitions are real in the south and Lori wonders if she needs to break out her sage when the bridal floor fills with brides who believe they're cursed.

3.title: If Mama's Not Happy...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Kari wants a dress that is simple and conservative, but her mom is looking for something sexy and revealing. Nita is a bride whose couture tastes don't mesh with her mom's off-the-rack budget. Susan hopes to put her mother-in-law's dress concerns to rest.

4.title: The Full Monte

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: It's Fashion Director Monte to the rescue when a bride's desire to flaunt her backside lands her in hot water. Erin's mom reminds her that, at 35, she's not a young bride. Amy's fitting is less than two weeks before her wedding.

5.title: Buyer's Remorse

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Elizabeth is a country girl who is more comfortable hunting than dress shopping. Christina's dad gives a less than excited response to a photo of his daughter in her dream dress. Kim's in for her fitting, but she's not convinced this is the final dress.

6.title: Head or Tails

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Marie just wants to please her mother and brother, but her indecision mixed with their brutal opinions are like pouring gasoline on a haystack. Jamie leaves her dress decision to a coin flip. Bride Carly brings her opinionated friend and picky mother.

7.title: Looking for Support

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: When cancer survivor Joya's dream dress is over her budget, her friends offer support. Ria knows exactly which dress she wants, but her picky friends won't give her the support she's looking for. With a clever two-dress plan, Neera keeps everyone happy.

8.title: For Better or Worse

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Katie, who is self-conscious about her figure and whether her dream dress will fit, also has a picky fiancé. Ivy's fiancé insists that Ivy tries on a dress that is four times her budget. Meg's 15-pound weight loss has the alterations team scrambling.

9.title: When Push Turns to Shove

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When picky bride Rene brings her even pickier mom, finding the right dress becomes almost impossible. Nnenna's mother is fed up with her daughter's indecision and takes matters into her own hands. Elizabeth has doubts about her dress choice.

10.title: Bridal Veterans

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: One Southern belle bride's traditional family wants to crush her dreams of a form-fitting, modern gown, while another bride's overbearing big sister tries to relive her own wedding as she shops for her little sis.

11.title: In Mom's Absence

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Margaret tragically lost her mother a few years ago and shopping for a wedding dress without her has been difficult. Jill brings her mother-in-law. Emily feels lucky to have her mother's support after her last dress fitting went horribly wrong.

12.title: The Royal Treatment

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Caitlyn isn't interested in sharing the spotlight while shopping for a dress. Mojdeh is convinced that her consultant won't be able to help her find a gown to make her feel like a princess. Katie returns after her first dress fitting was a disaster.

1.title: Southern Mamas are Hard, Y'all...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Holly wants to look like a princess but her mom and Grandma Ninny have another vision. Roni's mom says she's brought her boxing gloves because she's ready to fight it out. Lauren has yet to try on or even lay eyes on her custom made ball gown.

2.title: Go Big or Go Home

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: When mama's budget is challenged, a bride's dream dress is on the line. The groom's sisters completely disregard bride Brooke's budget and push her mom over the edge. Bride Kristie is an only child and used to getting what she wants.

3.title: A Fox in the Henhouse

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: When self-secure bride E'terica's fiancé questions her taste in wedding gowns, he also tests her confidence. After a major weight loss, bride Courtney doesn't see the slimmer version of herself in the mirror. Katy's mom isn't ready let go of her daughter.

4.title: Taming of the Shrews

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Lori reaches her limit with the most disrespectful bridesmaids she has ever met. One group tries to push a bride out of the dress of her dreams while another tries to push her into one she can't afford.

5.title: Mamas and Dramas and Tears, Oh My!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Lori and her team encounter some of their biggest conflicts yet. A mom in a dress, a NASCAR bride in distress, and a generational smack down has the bridal salon on high alert as bride's appointments are hijacked by their nearest and dearest.

6.title: Sibling Rivalry

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When sister brides show up to shop for their special day, Robin and Flo make a major faux pas by having the girls model the dresses for their family side by side. Regina put off dress shopping until her fiancé could return from his deployment in Iraq.

7.title: Be Bold

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Penny turns to her family, who dish out tough love and help her stand tall. Regan's indecisiveness is enough to bring the most seasoned bridal consultant to their knees. Sasha is looking for a pink dress to honor her mother's battle with breast cancer.

8.title: Are You Looking for Trouble

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Bridal dreams are tested and trouble abounds when one bride invites her fiance's ex-girlfriend to the salon. Lindsay has been carrying around a photo of her dream dress for over 6 months. Tracy wants a short dress, her fiance wants a long one.

9.title: Longest Appointment Ever...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: A bride who has tried on over 150 dresses, one who has already bought two wedding gowns and a first timer prove to be some of the pickiest brides the salon has ever seen and one sets a new record for longest appointment ever.

10.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Lacey is looking to show off her very large back tattoo and her mother wants it fully covered. Amanda wants an unlimited budget to shop for her wedding dress and her mom only wants to spend $4000. Sasha honors her mother with a pink bridal gown.

11.title: Two Moms Are Better Than None

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: When Hannah brings both her mom and stepmom to help her choose a dress, the competition gets fierce. Bride Kourtney suffers from her mom's absence. Bride Lauren was so determined to lose weight, that she ordered her dress a size smaller than recommended.

12.title: Brothers and Mothers

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Courtney comes from a cattle ranching family. JoLee's mother would be happy to see her daughter walk down the aisle in any white piece of clothing as long as it hides her figure. Marie-Ann's mom sadly won't be there for her daughter's big day.

13.title: Brides with Baggage

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Tinnell had already found her dream dress, but didn't buy it because she was determined to stay within her budget. Amanda and her family head over to BBL for a wedding dress do-over. Tykesha's outspoken daughter is one tough customer.

14.title: Everybody Say A-Ha!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Julie is missing her mom but staying positive that she'll find the perfect dress. Emily had tried on 20 dresses before her search leads her to BBL. A mix up on Madeleine's dress order had her mom convinced it might be a sign to call off her wedding.

15.title: Here Comes the Bride... And Her Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Consultant Brooke has her hands full with two brides, one who can't wait to find her dream dress. Bride Lindsay has conquered a weight problem and an eating disorder and is to show off her hard work. Bride Savannah is the picture of Southern tradition.

16.title: Power of the Purse

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Bride Jennifer has her budget-conscious dad in a cold sweat. Bride Manette is convinced a poofy gown she already put a deposit on is the one for her. Trouble is, her check-writing mother disagrees. Asha hasn't seen her wedding dress since she ordered it.

17.title: Bride Knows Best

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Judea has brought her divorced parents who have not seen each other in three years to her appointment. As they disagree on everything, Judea struggles to keep the drama at bay. Jane has tried on more than 100 wedding gowns and has yet to find "the one".

18.title: No Boys Allowed

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Breast cancer survivor Sonja feels her fiancé has already stuck with her for better or worse and should certainly be a part of picking out her wedding dress. Chirstine tries to impress her fiancé. Can the BBL team handle two foxes in a henhouse?

1.title: Dancing Queen

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Two brides, a pro dancer who can't commit to a dress and a pageant queen with her own team of finicky judges, struggle to find their dream dresses. They're used to dressing for the stage, but can they find the perfect gown to take them down aisle?

2.title: Daddy's Girls

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Two brides with traditional southern fathers struggle to find the perfect dress. One bride's dad rules out anything but pure white while another gets stuck between her city mom and country dad. Were traditions made to be broken?

3.title: Operation: Cinderella

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Choosing the perfect wedding gown isn't easy, especially when the bride is missing her mom. So it will it take some extra encouragement for these brides to say yes when they don't have the support of the most important person in their lives.

4.title: Vocal Training

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: One bride is on a search for Â"Southern Chic.Â" The problem? Not even the bride seems to know what that means. Meanwhile, a second bride's hunt for the perfect short dress gets derailed when her brutal posse is short on compliments.

5.title: Tunnel Vision

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Choosing the perfect wedding gown isn't easy, especially when two brides are cursed with tunnel vision. But if they can open their eyes to new possibilities, there will be light at the end of the tunnel.

6.title: Mini Monte

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: A bride's appointment is thrown into jeopardy when her fashionista friend pushes his own agenda. Meanwhile, a pair of twins have a radical shopping plan that backfires. Plus, a fashion-forward bride gets grief from her conservative peanut gallery.

7.title: Modern Day Scarlett

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: One bride, a Southern Belle, looks to reinvent herself as a modern-day Scarlett O'Hara, while another fussy bride can't rest until she has her perfect "aha" moment.

8.title: Fresh Start

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Two brides carry emotional baggage on their search for the perfect wedding gown. Finding THE dress becomes a right of passage that gives them permission to embrace their futures.

9.title: Mamas Know Best

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: An appointment is threatened when a bride playing dress-up is confronted with the reality of actually selecting a gown. Meanwhile, a princess bride is caught in the crossfire between her Southern mom's style and Northern mother-in-law's flare.

10.title: Double Mama Drama

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Mama Drama comes to a full boil when one bride's estranged mother lays a crippling guilt trip and another refuses to relent on her love of the ball gown.

11.title: Live for Today, Hope for Tomorrow

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: One bride, a Southern belle, has to battle her opinionated grandma to find her dream dress, while another bride is forced to move her wedding date up when her fiancÃ© gets a heartbreaking diagnosis.

12.title: High Fashion Anxiety

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Two brides face intense anxiety as they struggle to find their perfect gown. One, who's had actual panic attacks can't find that elusive Â"magic feelingÂ" while another is 120 dresses into her bridal odyssey.

13.title: It's More Than a Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Two brides are forced to reevaluate what they think a bride should look like on her wedding day. One needs to find a dress that fits into an unexpected future. And the other is forced to find a style that suits her personality and her figure.

14.title: Falling in Love

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: A surprise proposal really doesn't help focus one of the fussiest ladies to ever cross the salon threshold. Meanwhile, a bubbly bride is shot down by her persnickety posse. And a bride's first fitting is bittersweet as she feels her late mother's absence.

15.title: Say No to the Ballgown

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: One bride is searching for anything but a pageant gown. Unfortunately, each dress is being judged by her opinionated pageant Mom. Meanwhile, another bride has tried on 100 mermaid gowns in the search for her dream dress.

16.title: Father Knows Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: One bride is torn between her own dress vision and that of her family, while another bride shares her bittersweet appointment with her terminally ill father.

17.title: Stealing the Spotlight

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Two brides must overcome obstacles in order to find their dream dresses. One bride's mother tries to share the runway with her while a "faux Southern" bride's search for the perfect down-home gown leaves everybody baffled... including her.

18.title: Meant to Be

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: One untraditional bride is looking for the perfect Â"out-of-the-boxÂ" dress for when she meets her husband for the first time... AT THE WEDDING. Meanwhile, a former pageant queen is 70 dresses into the search for her dream dress.

19.title: Lori's 10 Commandments

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Lori Allen owner of Bridals by Lori receives news that changes her life forever, her doctor tells her she has breast cancer. So many stories have been told on the runway of Lori's shop, but this time she will tell her own.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Style sentiments clash when bride LeighAnn eyes a figure flattering gown but her daddy can't stand to see his little girl all grown up. Meanwhile bride Julie tries to hold her mom to a signed contract promising she won't meddle in her dress decision.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Style sentiments clash when bride LeighAnn eyes a figure flattering gown but her daddy can't stand to see his little girl all grown up. Meanwhile bride Julie tries to hold her mom to a signed contract promising she won't meddle in her dress decision.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: A cheerleading captain struggles to maintain her sunny outlook against some sharp comments from her peanut gallery, while another bride fights for a little floral embellishment as her mom looks to nip her dream dress in the bud.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: A vow renewal bride hopes to shed the bad memories of her first wedding day, while another bride who feels like an ugly duckling hopes to find a dress that will transform her into a beautiful swan.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Daddy's little girl Christina is longing for a lace gown but her gruff, Southern father can't stand the look. Meanwhile, Consultant Flo has her hands full trying to please modest seventeen-year-old bride Kara by pleasing her entire family.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Bride Carol wants to knock her husband's socks off in a sexy gown during their vow renewal ceremony, but her football star son can't stand the thought of his mama getting her groove on. And when bride Gretchen's mom shoots down the only lace-backed gown

14.title: Bridal Floor Bullies

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: One Southern belle bride's traditional family wants to crush her dreams of a form-fitting, modern gown, while another bride's overbearing big sister tries to relive her own wedding as she shops for her little sis.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Two brides run into trouble as they try to show off what GodÂ-or a surgeonÂ-gave them. Bride Jessica wants to flaunt what she's got... but her preacher Pappy disagrees! Bride Kaitlin's new implants might prove tricky since her cups now runneth over.

16.title: A Little Help from Her Friends

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Snarky comments from Tamlyn's Southern Mama are keeping this bride down in the dumps and hiding out in the dressing room. How can she possibly say yes to her dream dress when her Mama just won't back down?

17.title: Poof, There It Is!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Bride Sonya and her fiancé have conflicting opinions as to what kind of gown she should wear. He's all about the ball gown, she'd rather something more fitted. Meanwhile, hard-to-please Bride Shelby has been to more than 20 salons in search of her dress.

18.title: Baby Wants Bling

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.title: Good News, Bad News

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: ABC News Bride Linsey is on a special assignment: to find her perfect wedding gown. But everything her entourage chooses fails to live up to her own expectations. Bride Tessie knows she wants to be a princess on her wedding day she's just which one.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: A young widow makes her second trip to the altar, this time she's getting married onstage at a Train concert. Meanwhile, a virgin bride hits the bridal shop for the very first time, but saying yes to the dress could prove to be the biggest decision yet.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.title: Rolling with the Punches

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: A Southern belle wants to shed her pageant image for her big day, but her stage mom isn't having it. Tomboy roller derby bride, Jennifer, is trying to lose the gym shorts and be the picture of elegance when she walks down the aisle.

5.title: Thinking Outside of the Box

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Bride Kierra brings along her former pageant coach to help her find a wedding dress with "wow" factor. Bride Jenny and her fashion diva bridesmaid battle over to wear or not to wear lace. Gretchen comes back to the salon to try on her custom-made gown.

6.title: Divas on the Defense

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Bride Kierra brings along her former pageant coach to help her find a wedding dress with "wow" factor. Bride Jenny and her fashion diva bridesmaid battle over to wear or not to wear lace. Gretchen comes back to the salon to try on her custom-made gown.

7.title: Bucking Tradition

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Bride Jessica loves all things camouflage and wants to somehow incorporate it into her wedding gown. Meanwhile, Kaleeta, a bride who hates shopping needs serious help finding her dream dress.

8.title: Chocolate Milk, Mermaids and Mothers

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Alicia's unique definition of a sexy dress has her mom and the salon staff running in circles. Whitney's desire for a mermaid dress to show off her curves sends mom running for cover. Laura Beth is back for her fitting, unsure she made the right decision.

9.title: More Granny, More Problems

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Bride Jessie doesn't see eye to eye with her penny-pinching 93-year-old Grandma. A peacock-lovin' bride is determined to find a gown that matches her unusual accessories. Bride Maria seeks her sisters' approval during her final fitting.

10.title: The Bride Strikes Back

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: A Star Wars obsessed bride is set on looking like Princess Leia on her big day. A Southern belle is determined to find a groovy dress for her vintage hippie themed wedding. Bride Yetmon's fitting is a challenge as she's even smaller than her size 2 dress.

11.title: I Do Again

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Small-town bride Lindsay has big, princess dreams for her wedding dress. Bride Bailey has simple tastes, but her bling-loving Mom is on sparkle patrol. In for her fitting, Allie's worried a little weight gain will prevent her from fitting into her dress.

12.title: Princess Brides Beware

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Small-town bride Lindsay has big, princess dreams for her wedding dress. Bride Bailey has simple tastes, but her bling-loving Mom is on sparkle patrol. In for her fitting, Allie's worried a little weight gain will prevent her from fitting into her dress.

13.title: Hope on a Hanger

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Meredith is looking for her dream wedding dress to carry her through her upcoming cancer treatments. It's a battle of North vs. South when Kelly's New York mom and southern mother-in-law have differing opinions of what Kelly should wear on her big day.

14.title: No to the Bow

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Kayla wants to please her strong-willed mom while shopping for a wedding dress. Danielle wants to wear a lace gown on her big day- but her Dad is set against it. In for her fitting, Whitney hopes her dress will live up to her mom's high standards.

15.title: Tulle vs. Ta-Ta's

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Bride Summer falls in love with a dress nearly twice her budget. Brooke, an NFL cheerleader fights to show off her Â"pom-pomsÂ", despite her Mother's opinion. And bride Meredith must decide which shoes will be most comfortable, post back surgery.

16.title: Team Spirit

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Bride Mallory is torn between trendy versus conservative, but which will win? Lorie has recently lost over 100 pounds but struggles to get comfortable in her new skin. Unsure about the actual shade of her wedding dress, Bride Katie is concerned.

17.title: Booty-do's and Ball Gowns

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Runaway bride Kate has been engaged four times, so it's no surprise that she also has trouble committing to a gown. To make up for her first time around, Jackie wants the sassy vow renewal gown of her dreams, but will her princess-lovin' Mom get onboard?

18.title: The Family Feud

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Bride Cindy brings her fiancÃ© AND their four kids to her appointment, much to Lori's dismay. Cheyna's biker Dad envisions her in a "hellion" dress, but when the team has a hard time finding a match, Monte sets them on the right path.

1.title: Extra-Special Day

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: In the Season 6 premiere, TV personality Adrianna Costa looks for a second dress to wear to her reception, but her mother hopes she'll opt for something conservative. Also: A mother hopes to please her daughters with her selection.

2.title: Bridal Sabotoge

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Youth Minster Tameria wants to wear a simple dress on her big day, but her fashion forward family has other ideas. Hailey puts aside her sexy dress vision to please her future mother-in law. Traditional bride Katie considers an unexpected gown alteration.

3.title: Mom's Way or The Highway

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: A bride wants a sexy dress to impress her fiancé, but her traditional mother has other ideas; a bride's appointment is undone by her mother's disturbing behavior; a bride hopes to repair her relationship with her mother while dress shopping.

4.title: To Sleeve, or Not to Sleeve

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Amanda wants a dress that shows off her tattoos, but her mom prefers she covers up her ink. Southern gal Lexie needs to find a dress that matches her fiancés family heirloom veil. Will indecisive Brittany finally say yes to the dress at her final fitting?

5.title: Playing Chicken

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Jessica wants a dress to satisfy her conservative fiancé but her family has other ideas. Savvy shopper Tracy is looking for a deal but her opinionated friend is unimpressed with the sale rack. Laura hopes a unique alteration will honor her mother in law.

6.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The rules of friendship are tested when best friend brides Jenaya and Terinni both fall in love with the same wedding dress. In for their fittings, brides Lex and Amy insist on keeping their final gown reveals a secret from each other until their big day.

7.title: Pastor Princess

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: After two broken engagements, pastor bride Shaundalyn wants to look sexy on her big day despite her conservative friend's approval. Ashley is looking for a glam dress, but her sassy grandma has other ideas. Bride Hope stuns in her unexpected dress choice.

8.title: There's No "I" in Groom

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Samantha brings her fiancé dress shopping against her mom's wishes. Kelsey asks her best friend to help her pick a wedding dress but their visions don't agree. In for her final fitting, Katie hopes her weight loss won't cause too many more alterations.

9.title: Brides by the Numbers

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Bride Lindsey could leave the store empty-handed when her big entourage forgets to consider her vision. After trying on more than 75 dresses, picky bride Monica has yet to find the one. Princess-obsessed Natalie surprises everyone at her dress fitting.

10.title: Breaking the Bank

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: A bride has no style in mind and is unsure of her wedding details; a bride hopes her dress will finally fit at her last appointment; a bride and her sister have difficulty agreeing on a dress.

11.title: No Time for Nostalgia

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Bride Leah is looking for a modern bridal gown with pockets to wear on her wedding day. But her sassy Southern Granny has a more vintage dress in mind. Bride Courtney and her dad have always been close...until she bought a gown without his final approval.

12.title: Chances Are...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Tamisha and her friend battle over who has the best bridal vision. Meredith wants a simple dress for her laid-back wedding, but her family unwilling to see her settle. In for her fitting, Lindsay is worried her dress won't fit her slimmed down figure.

13.title: Bride Overboard

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Bride Andi and her fiancé struggle to agree on the perfect gown for their destination, sailboat wedding. Bold bride Susan wants to stand out in a colorful dress on her big day but her daughter and niece are determined to see her in something more classic.

14.title: It Takes Two

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Jenee has every detail set for her big day - except for the dress! Country girl, Jessica has a specific vision in mind for her gown. But her sister-in-law's city taste could stand in the way. At her fitting, Leslie is still looking for her mom's approval.

15.title: Shiny, Happy, Bling!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: After spending her youth in outfits covered in bling, Emily wants to wear a traditional gown on her big day. Fashionista Diana is looking for a strapless gown, but her mom has other ideas. At her fitting, Jackie is still looking for her mom's approval.

16.title: Twelve's a Crowd

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Donnetta brought twelve friends to help her find a dress that puts her in the spotlight. But will her unruly group let the bride's voice be heard? Chelsea wants a gown that shows off her curves. Hannah hopes her sister will support her unique shoe choice.

17.title: Up the Aunt-ie

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Former beauty queen, Macey wants a dress that differs from her old pageant gowns. But her bossy aunt insists on having the final say. Nikki and her aunt struggle to see eye to eye on her top gown pick. At her fitting, Hailee longs for her mom's approval.

18.title: By the Book

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Romance novelist, Valerie prefers to live through her storybook characters for gown inspiration. Bride Kristy dreams of walking down the aisle looking just like her favorite childhood doll. In for her fitting, Rachel second guesses her dress selection.

1.title: The Bridal Countdown!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Salina is getting married today! With the clock ticking, Lori and team must do whatever it takes to help this bride find the perfect dress. Former beauty queen now Army soldier Kelsey is caught between her pageant past and her simple style present.

2.title: Out of Bridal Bounds

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sports coach, Merri loves her gym attire- but her girly entourage is pushing for glam! Bodybuilder, Sara wants a gown that shows off her muscles while still looking ladylike. Brandy purchased a gown in a smaller size, and is hoping it fits!

3.title: First Dresses and Second Guesses

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Hannah grew up in a children's home and was used to sharing her clothes. Now a bride, Hannah is eager to find a dress to call her own. Shawanda refuses to let her budget get in the way of her dreams. Anastasia's big gown may create even bigger problems.

4.title: Bringing Bridal Back

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Leslie is looking for a dress that will let her dance the night away. After winning her cancer battle, Kayla is finally ready to plan her wedding. But will her opinionated mother in law stand in her way? Samantha hopes her gown will still wow her fiance.

5.title: Battle of the Curves

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Trina is looking for a dress that will show off her assets; despite her Mom's conservative demands. Bride Shelby wants a gown that shows a little more skin than her traditional Dad would prefer. Bride Haley faces an extra special challenge at her fitting.

6.title: Once Upon a Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Amber has always dreamed of wearing a fairytale, princess gown on her big day. But her aunt is pushing for a more grown up look. Julie is looking for the perfect dress for her vow renewal ceremony. In for her fitting, Nicki hopes for her aunt's approval.

7.title: The Big Picture

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Hannah has already purchased two gowns to please her fiancés specific dress request. Still unimpressed by either, Hannah is at the salon hoping to find a gown that represents her bridal fantasy. Later, Daedrea's pushy mom threatens her dream dress vision.

8.title: Blush-ing Brides

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Magan wants to walk down the aisle in a gown with color. But her unique choice has her family seeing red. Monica is looking for a princess dress to honor her late mom's wishes. In for her fitting, O'Shea makes a special request that is close to her heart.

9.title: Dare to Be Different

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: People-pleaser Holly, clashes with her pushy future sister-in-law; trying on dresses conjures up painful memories for widowed bride Chrissy; second-time bride Fran wants to make a last-minute alteration to her gown.

10.title: Bridal Baggage Blues

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: People-pleaser Holly, clashes with her pushy future sister-in-law; trying on dresses conjures up painful memories for widowed bride Chrissy; second-time bride Fran wants to make a last-minute alteration to her gown.

11.title: Eye of the Bridal Storm

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Legally blind bride Jessi argues with her overbearing mom about finding an age-appropriate dress; passive bride Karen must make her voice heard above her opinionated pro-wrestler fiancé's; bride Lindsay is exhausted after shopping with 13 bridesmaids.

12.title: Gold Medal Gown

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Olympic bobsledder bride Elana and her opinionated mother battle over the length of her reception dress; bride Courtney worries her dream dress won't please her terminal grandmother; bride Lacie questions her ball gown decision.

13.title: A Dress with a Fighting Chance

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Military bride Sarah challenges her assertive mom and friends' opinions; sorority sisters and siblings clash when bride Mon Cheri says she wants a poofy princess gown; bride Diana hopes to honor her beloved godfather on her special day.

14.title: Worth the Weight

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Military bride Sarah challenges her assertive mom and friends' opinions; sorority sisters and siblings clash when bride Mon Cheri says she wants a poofy princess gown; bride Diana hopes to honor her beloved godfather on her special day.

15.title: The Ties That Bind

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: With only three months to go until her big day, indecisive bride June is under pressure to find a gown TODAY. Selfless bride Cecelia is looking for a dress that will put her in the spotlight. In for her fitting, bride Hillary hopes for her dad's approval.

16.title: Good Things Come to Those Who Wait

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: With only three months to go until her big day, indecisive bride June is under pressure to find a gown TODAY. Selfless bride Cecelia is looking for a dress that will put her in the spotlight. In for her fitting, bride Hillary hopes for her dad's approval.

17.title: Curves and Curveballs

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Bride Zelda must win over her family after revealing she got engaged over the phone and hasn't seen her fiancé in 12 years; after losing 50 pounds, bride Emma debates buying an even smaller gown and losing more weight before her big day.

18.title: Times Are A-Changing

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Second time bride, LaToya wants to walk down the aisle in a gown that puts her in the spotlight. Former pageant queen, Maggie struggles to leave behind her blingy dress past. Bride Kristina returns with a circle of support for an emotional ceremony.

1.title: A Dress Against All Odds

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Dana has her heart set on channeling the bridal look worn by her pop star idol. Caroline's dress vision is threated by her very opinionated entourage. Elizabeth hopes her fitting will be a lasting memory for her mom who is unable to attend her wedding.

2.title: Whose Wedding Is It Anyway?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: A bride who adores Beyonce wants to look like her idol; a bride's opinionated entourage threatens her vision; a bride hopes her fitting is a memorable occasion for her mother, who won't be able to attend the wedding.

3.title: Fifty Shades of White

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Bride Morgan is marrying country music star Jerrod Neiman and needs a dress that will impress. Problem is.. her vision is in her head, and not in the store. Bride Elesia's mom is determined to see her daughter walk down the aisle in white and only white.

4.title: Bridal Highs and Woes

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: At over 6 ft tall, shopping has always been a challenge for Bride Stacy. In for her wedding dress, Stacy's biggest problem is now her unfiltered Mom. After trying on over 80 wedding gowns to date, Bride Taylor is in the salon to find the one - hopefully.

5.title: Wedding Gown Bro Down

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Bride Taylor is all about glitz and glam, so naturally she wants her wedding dress to be a show-stopper. But with her NFL star brother Maurice Jones Drew paying for the dress, will her over the top dress dreams come true?

6.title: I Do... Does Dad?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: A bride is torn between pleasing her father and her fiance; a YouTube star's very different dress visions; one bride wants a simple gown but her fashion-forward father has different ideas.

7.title: Runaway Bride, Runaway Budget

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Bride Julianne has chosen to elope against her families wishes. To ease some of the tension, Julianne brings her family to the salon to help her select her wedding dress. Bride Loren wants a wedding gown fit for a queen; despite her mom's tight budget.

8.title: Double Brides, Double Trouble

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The rules of friendship are tested when best friend brides Jenaya and Terinni both fall in love with the same wedding dress. In for their fittings, brides Lex and Amy insist on keeping their final gown reveals a secret from each other until their big day.

9.title: Betting Against the Barn

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Chasity wants a fabulous dress for her Vegas themed wedding, but her fashionista brother has other ideas. Bride Sarah's mom deems her daughters dress vision too fancy for her barn wedding. Bride Gail hopes her dieting won't affect her final dress fitting.

10.title: Love and Basketball

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: WNBA star Glory Johnson brings her fiancé WNBA player Brittney Griner to help find a gown that feels just right. But it's not all fun and games for Glory as the pressure to find the one rises. Later, bride McCall's worst fears are realized at her fitting.

11.title: No Room for the Groom

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: With just weeks left until her big day, Lisa has brought her opinionated fiancé to the store for dress backup. Later, bride Christina's long-distance engagement has left her friends and family weary. Can Christina soften the blow with the perfect gown?

12.title: A Dress Worth Saying I Do

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: After surviving a car crash, Brandi turned to singer, Jessie James Decker's song lyrics to help her move forward. Now a bride, Brandi hopes to find a dress similar to what Jessie wore on her big day. And Liz struggles to embrace her new body in any dress.

13.title: When the Leading Man Takes a Stand

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: To bride Kiara, the only opinion that matters is her grandfathers. But when Kiara falls for a dress over budget, she may risk leaving the salon empty handed. Strength competitor Talia struggles to find a dress that pleases both her vision and her fiancés.

14.title: A Case of Tunnel Vision

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Focused on helping her fiance recover from an accident, Michelle has spent no time on her wedding. With the help of supermodel Niki Taylor, this deserving bride is ready to find a dress! Ronesha has a very clear vision for her wedding dress..well kind of.

15.title: No Such Thing as a Country Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Tareka aims to trade in her city chic style for a "country gown." But her fashion forward entourage has other ideas. Engineer Allison hopes to find a modest dress to match her casual style. Chelsea panics when her custom reception dress fails to impress.

16.title: Mother May I?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Jibrell wants to look like a princess on her big day. But her unfiltered Mom may turn Jibrells fairytale dress dreams into a nightmare. Kassie struggles to find a gown without her late mother. And, Bianca hopes to impress her parents with her dress pick.

17.title: A Bridal Change of the Heart

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Brandy comes to the salon armed with her country superstar boss, Naomi Judd with a specific vision for her wedding dress. Runaway bride Rita is ready to walk down the aisle in a short gown. Victoria surprises Monte with a unique request at her fitting.

18.title: The Most FANtastic Day Ever!

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Lori and Monte surprise super fan and bride-to-be Katie with an extra special bridal shopping experience at the salon.

1.title: Two Monte's Are Better Than One

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Bride Katherine wants a vintage dress she can wear with cowboy boots but her bff is pushing for a Parisian inspired gown. Bride Dawn's son is a mini-fashionista who gives Monte a run for his money as he seeks out the perfect dress for his mom.

2.title: I Feel Fierce

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Bride Jaye is eager to try on wedding gowns for her big day, but is shocked to find her sister has taken her place on the runway! Bride Allysa searches for a truly unique dress, to compliment her medieval themed wedding.

3.title: What Would Phaedra Do?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Bride Nikki gets a big surprise when her favorite celebrity idol shows up to help her choose the wedding gown of her dreams! Meanwhile, Bride Melody is ready to see her custom jet-black gown, but will her mom approve of this non-traditional choice?

4.title: A Little Sparkle Goes a Long Way

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: YouTube Sensation and bride, BFFTaylor won't feel satisfied with her dress until her mom cries. Olympian bride Kellie Wells comes in tow with Team Conservative and Team Sexy... and she must please them both, or risk leaving empty-handed.

5.title: Are You Ready to Play Bridal Blitz?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Bride Precious falls in love with a ballgown, but her men of honor think it's a royal mistake. Bride Emily said yes to her fiancé after 6 weeks of dating, but finding the perfect dress in time for her upcoming wedding takes longer than expected!

6.title: My Big Fat Ethiopian Wedding

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Bride Saba needs a dress that fits her conservative Ethiopian culture, but still wants something fun and sexy for the reception. Bride Tiffany's family is too far away to help her shop, so Lori and Monte stand in for her Mom and Dad!

7.title: Waiting for a Sign

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Lori and Monte hit the road with a pop-up salon in tow to surprise a very special bride who is getting married in just 2 days! Due to a recent tragedy, bride Anna has not taken the time to find a dress, but Team BBL is certain they can save the day!

8.title: A Trio of Options

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Bride Katy brought along her stylish Aunt Kristin to shop, but will she keep Katy's vision in mind? Bride Genine falls in love with a dress but her sort-of-psychic friend isn't sure. Meanwhile Monte helps bride Gretchen tailor her dress to perfection.

9.title: Multiple Dress Personality Disorder

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: WNBA star and Bride Angel has a game plan is to say yes to a pantsuit but her friend thinks she should sport a dress. Bride Angel's fiancée, Brande, isn't sure about the kind of dress she wants. Meanwhile Bride Cassie is on the hunt for the perfect veil.

10.title: I'll Just Call Myself the Original Diva

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: According to Bride Sarah's mom they already found the perfect dress but Sarah isn't convinced... Can Monte find a dress they both love? Bride Comfort loves bling but her mom doesn't... Will Lori be able to find a dress that fits both their styles?

11.title: If I Feel Like a Penny, I Need to Look Like a Million

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: A breast cancer survivor wants to show off her curves, but her mom has a more modest dress in mind; a bride's mother disagrees with her style, but Lori suspects there's more to her opinion than meets the eye.

12.title: Gone with the Wind Fabulous

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: A motorcycle chic searches for a dress while another wants a modern design for a beach wedding.

13.title: 88 and Out the Gate

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Lori and Monte head to Nashville to help country artist, Jimmy Stanley, with a surprise proposal to fellow country singer Kristin Kelley. She will also get another surprise from Lori and Monte that she'll never see coming..

14.title: Gonna Sing You a Song 'Bout the Dress I Don't Have

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Lori and Monte head to Nashville to help country artist, Jimmy Stanley, with a surprise proposal to fellow country singer Kristin Kelley. She will also get another surprise from Lori and Monte that she'll never see coming...

15.title: Rockabilly & Motorcycles

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Bride Jeanette wants a black dress but her parents are hoping for something less depressing... Bride Mackenzie' s custom 100-year-old dress didn't turn out as planned and with two weeks until her wedding day, she'll need one that won't blow her budget.

16.title: Momma's Holdin' Back

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Bride Shanna's outspoken mom has no intention of making her daughter's bridal appointment easy. Suzanne and her wedding planner differ on a bridal vision, which is challenging considering her teen daughter is her wedding planner!

17.title: Mother of the Groom

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Lori's son is getting married, and taking a back seat is anything but easy for this queen of bridal; Monte helps plan the perfect wedding for Cory and Becca.

imdb.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
plot: Newly engaged women from all around the world come to this wedding dress store to find the perfect dress.
